resources.string: Minders is a student activity int the faculty of Computers and information Systems, Helwan University, Helps discovering the potintials buried inside students supports and improves them, in order to develop projects that help them get connected to the job market.
Create your own passion and always go with your passion never ask yourself if it\'s realistic or not.
There are no mistakes in life, only lessons.there is no such thing as a negative experience, only opportunities to grow! and remember, nobody learns without getting it wrong
The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something and remember that the happiest people are not those getting more but those giving more!
Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself! Remember all things are possible for those who believe
Great things never came from comfort zones. And remember that a ship is always safe at shore, but that is not what it was created for
You are the author of your life story, start writing its first chapter, and do not let anyone else hold the pen live the story, you designed for yourself!
